item.description:
Join us as we break out some classic/vintage board games.

 

By request we are hosting a classic game event.

 

This event is family friendly if you have school aged children that enjoy playing games they are welcome. Just give me a heads up in RSVP.

 

Game Examples:

Checkers, Chess, Parcheesi, Scrabble, Pictionary, Sorry, Clue, Cribbage, Flinch, Card Games, MahJong, Yahtzee, maybe Crokinole if you guys want it and more!

 

If you have a favorite classic game please bring them along. We can never have enough! (Leave Monopoly boards at home though, as it will not see table time. Sorry!) 

Let me know what games you want to play and I will make sure to bring them along!

I will also be bringing a few other games that I consider "classics/staples" of Eurogaming. 

As always, any questions just let me know.

Wayne
item.how_to_find_us: Come find me via my photo or ask for the gaming Meetup!
item.why: We all love playing games. Its time to break out the vintage ones! Join us for this family friendly community game night at G. Willikers! Toy Shop in downtown Portsmouth, NH.

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: "Classic" Games at G. Willikers Toy Shop!
